Name: Ruby
Description: Embedding gems into gear can endow the gear with the unique effects contained in the gems.
Description$english: Embedding gems into gear can endow the gear with the unique effects contained in the gems.
Description2$english: Finished gem obtained through basic Gemcrafting processing of raw crystal materials. Combines aesthetic appeal with practical utility.

recipes.Name: Ruby
recipes.Des: Used for gear embedding, grants gear a slight Weak Point Strike attribute.
recipes.Des$english: Used for gear embedding, grants gear a slight Weak Point Strike attribute.

NeedMaterial.Name: Starlight  Ruby Lv.1
NeedMaterial.Description: Through Gemcrafting, raw ore can be processed into Ruby.
NeedMaterial.Description$english: Through Gemcrafting, raw ore can be processed into Ruby.
NeedMaterial.Description2$english: A rare raw stone growing on Regnus, exhibiting a fiery red glow.
